## EthersGivety.getLiquidityMiningGVTYReward() method

Get the amount of GVTY earned by an address through mining liquidity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLiquidityMiningGVTYReward(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose GVTY reward should be retrieved. |
|  overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) |  |
